image

Class ImageProcessing

  • java.lang.Object
    • image.ImageProcessing

  • public class ImageProcessing
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImageProcessing class holds all our methods for processing images.

      ImageProcessing()

        redFilter - amount to red to add to the image
        greenFilter - amount to green to add to the image
        blueFilter - amount to blue to add to the image
